lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Okay, I've given this a lot of thought.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Any luck? I've been thinking it over too, but it's just been a lot of dead ends.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You said that the evidence would be thrown out in court because we obtained it illegaly, right?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What if we somehow lost it and re-obtained it legally?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: What.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Think about it!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: We could take the flash drive to a park, close our eyes, and toss the flash drive into the air.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Once it's out of our hands, it will officially leave our possession and enter the Domain of the Lost.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Then we'll open our eyes and scour the park to legitimately find the evidence out in the open.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: With your sharp sight and my detective skills, I'm sure we'll find it in no time.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: After that, we'll take the totally-admissable evidence to court, and bing bang boom, True Justice is served!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Locke... I hate to say it, but there's no way that that process would render the evidence admissable.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: And even if it did, I don't think anyone would believe we did all that.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Darn, I really thought I was onto something there.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I know, but that's just how things are sometimes.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I don't think that there's any way that we can come forward with the evidence.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Still, I know you tried your best, Locke, and I'll always appreciate that.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait... what did you just say?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I said that I appreciate your efforts, Locke.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: What do you want, a recording? I'm not saying it a third time.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: No, before that. "There's no way that WE can come forward with the evidence."

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What if it doesn't have to be us?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I mean, what if we just sent the flash drive to some kinda news place and stuff?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: We'll just make sure not to tell them who we are, we'll be an anonymous source!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I just hope that the journalists believe what's on the flash drive.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...Yeah. It's our best shot though, so there's nothing else we can do but hope.
-- A few days later --

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Locke, where are you? Guess what!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Huh-wha? Lynn what's going on?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Did we win? Did we lose?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Please don't say that we lost.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: We got the flash drive into the right hands, and the dirt on Deuce was all over the local news!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: You... really didn't know all that, Locke? You could have found out with a simple search on Doogle News.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: To be honest, I kiiinda spilled orange juice on my laptop a few days ago.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I haven't been able to go on any site, not even Ribbitter, ever since.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I'm surprised you can afford orange juice.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: That's the part you're surprised by?!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Anyways, with Deuce's crimes brought to light, he's finally ousted from his position and slapped with a court date.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: We're still a ways away from a proper verdict, but the deck is definitely stacked against him.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Nice! But wow, the law moves fast around here.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: What's more, I've been promoted to chief of police.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hey congratulations Lynn-

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I mean- Fedelynn? Or wait, Chief?

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Haha, I've gotten use to Lynn. You're not a kid anyways.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Phew, alright. Formalities can get weird.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But I don't think the position of chief could have gone to anyone better-suited for the job.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Flattery isn't going to get you out of future trouble, Locke.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I mean it!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I meant what I said before about your commitment to doing to the right thing.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I could say the same about you.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Even if you have your own... unconventional methods.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You flatter me.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Hey, how do you feel about working with the police in a more official capacity?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What, as a police detective?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I don't think blue's really my color.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: No, I mean as a consulting detective. Sort of like Keyna.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hmm, well we did make a pretty good team.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Just a few conditions: Try not to dance over any more evidence, and definitely don't break into any private residences in the future.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hmmm...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well, it's tough but fair.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I promise that I will neither dance over evidence deliberately nor will I break into any private residences without a really REALLY good reason.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You have my word.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Uh-uh, that's not good enough.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Pinky promise on it. That's the only way to do this.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Curses! You know I can't say no to a pinky promise!

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: I'm also willing to treat you out to lunch sometime.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's a done deal.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Honestly, I worry with what you feed yourself.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Nonsense! I'm a responsible adult with responsible eating habits!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Now let's go get some donuts.

lines.name: Fedelynn
lines.text: Haha, just this once.
